title: The Graveyard Witch
description: 12 year old Carrie Newberry has big problems; the daughter of the graveyard caretaker is a social outcast. Bullied by a trio of mean girls who used to be her friends, failing algebra and developing a bad habit of lying to her Dad, the only parent she has left and the only person in town who doesn't know everyone in school calls her the Graveyard Witch. Oh and now Eric Oates, the most popular boy in school is harassing her, promising to protect her socially if she will help him contact his recently dead father. Can she be help Eric deal with his grief of losing his father even as she is still trying to deal with losing her mother?
author: Abra Montgomery
